title: Dio.Sacred Heart.DVDrip.XviD
description:
There&#039;s only one place where a castle, a fire-breathing dragon, and a giant crystal ball coexist with lasers, holographs, and 25 tons of high-tech sound equipment. Recorded live on Dio&#039;s 1986 tour, this Philadelphia Spectrum performance unleashes a dozen songs, including "King Of Rock &#039;N&#039; Roll," "Holy Diver," "Rainbow In The Dark," and "Sacred Heart." Bonus features include interviews with Ronnie James Dio, Craig Goldy, and Simon Wright.   

#  Draco Ignis
#  King Of Rock And Roll
#  Time To Burn
#  The Last In Line/Holy Diver
#  Heaven And Hell
#  Sacred Heart
#  Rock &#039;N&#039; Roll Children
#  Long Live Rock &#039;N&#039; Roll
#  Man On The Silver Mountain
#  Rock &#039;N&#039; Roll Children (Reprise)
#  Rainbow In The Dark
#  Hungry For Heaven
  

[60 MIN.; COLOR; NOT RATED]
